lines.content: Welcome to CliRental, a perfect desktop app dedicate to managing  a car rental business involves handling large volumes of data, making traditional pen-and-paper methods inefficient for managers. This app is designed specifically for car rental managers, offering a Command Line Interface (CLI) that enables quick data entry and efficient tracking of customers, cars, and transactions.
Clirental is a CLI-based application which allows car rental companies
to track their customers , cars and rental transactions.
1. Ensure that you have Java 17 or above installed.
1. Down the latest version of `CliRental` from [here](https://github.com/AY2425S1-CS2113-T11-3/tp/releases).
### Adding a user to the database: `add-user`
